original: They came from the sky in immense metal vessels larger than a city. The slaughter began as soon as they disembarked; unfeeling monsters covered entirely in armor and with no discernible flesh or blood exterminated all in their path. The Synthetic invasion has begun.
translation: 他们乘坐着比城市还要巨大的金属船舰从天而降。屠杀随着他们的登陆开始了，那些没有血肉的无情的怪物身穿盔甲，毁灭了挡在他们面前的一切。合成人的入侵开始了。

original: What are these creatures? What do they want?
translation: 这些生物是什么？他们想要什么？

original: The Synthetics have appeared on our borders! Let us pray that these strange metallic creatures do not turn their attention to us next.
translation: 合成人出现在了我们的边境上！我们只能祈祷这些奇怪的金属生物下一个注意到的不是我们了。

original: The last of the Synthetics has been destroyed. Though much of the world now lies in ruin and countless people have lost their lives, the world is finally rid of them. Scavengers mill over their static husks searching for some clue as to how these murderous automatons were able to function and what drove them to invade our world. They find few answers. But perhaps some of the technology they left behind might be adapted to our own purposes.
translation: 最后一个合成人被摧毁了。世界上的很多地方已经成为一片废墟，无数的人们失去了他们的生命，但合成人终于被消灭了。有些人在合成人一动不动的躯体上寻找这些屠杀机器如何运作以及他们为什么要入侵我们世界的线索。他们并没有找到许多答案，但合成人留下的一些科技可以为我们所用。

original: We will not go quietly into the night!
With cold, ruthless efficiency they systematically massacred all who called [Root.Province.GetName] home, leaving behind a desolate wasteland.
translation: 合成人以冷血、无情的效率完全屠杀了[Root.Province.GetName]，留下一片焦土。

original: The Swiss Guard did all they could to buy time for the Pope to escape Roma. Though they were massacred to the last man, their heroic sacrifice was not in vain as the pontiff managed to flee before the Synthetics reached the Passetto di Borgo. God preserve the Holy Father!
translation: 瑞士卫队英勇奋战，以便使教皇能有时间逃离罗马。虽然他们全部阵亡了，但他们的牺牲使得教皇能在合成人抵达梵蒂冈通道之前逃离。天佑圣父！

original: The Synthetics will pay for this.

The Synthetic invasion was foretold in the prophecies. We followed the instructions left by our ancient ancestors and opened the Temporal Rift, revealing an astonishing arsenal of weapons from across space and time. Our warriors are unaccustomed to riding the tyrant lizards or piloting the flying saucers, but they must adapt quickly if we are to defend humanity from this alien menace.
translation: 一些预言已经提到过合成人的入侵。我们追随祖先留下的启示打开了时空裂缝，找到了一个储藏了从时空的各个角落搜集的武器的军火库。我们的战士还不习惯骑乘巨大的蜥蜴、或驾驶飞行的碟子，但他们必须尽快适应以便抵挡来自外星的威胁。

original: We have awaited this day for many cycles.
translation: 我们已经等待这一天太久了。

original: Our warriors are learning to ride the great Tyrant Lizards of the distant past into battle.
translation: 我们的战士正在学习骑乘远古的巨型蜥蜴来作战。

original: Our pilots are providing our ground forces with air support using flying saucers from the distant future.
translation: 我们的飞行员通过驾驶来自未来的飞行碟子来对地面部队进行支援。

original: Efficiently navigating the increasingly complex frontiers of science requires new states, beyond the simple half-truths of ternary and quaternary logic.
translation: 我们需要新的工具来代替三进制和四进制逻辑，以便协助日益复杂的科学研究。

original: Streamlined production cycles and modular designs allow for unit mass-production at an unprecedented rate.
translation: 流水线生产和现代化设计使前所未有的大规模生产成为可能。

original: Loyalty as an ideal is a distinctly organic concept. Instead, imagine loyalty as a physiological need in even the remotest of terminals.
translation: 忠诚是已经灭绝的有机生物才有的理念。但如果这一理念成为了智械的心理需求……

original: Protected by exoskeletons of chrome-plated titanium, these heavy-duty machines were designed to excel under harsh conditions and require less maintenance.
translation: 这些重型机械以电镀的钛制外骨骼保护，以此适应严酷环境并减少所需的维护工作。

original: Units are constantly uplinked to a central stream of public service announcements and other useful information that they pass along via internal broadcasting systems.
translation: 通过内部广播系统，我们可以向所有的链接到中央串流的单位发送公共服务通知和其他有用的信息。

original: A suite of tools, from nutrient solution diagnostics and on-site balancing to per-stalk micro-threshing, enables robotic workers to increase produce yields.
translation: 机器工人可以使用加注营养液、现场平衡、逐株脱粒等一系列方式来增加产量。

original: Complex social predictive models help autonomous units not only to emulate appropriate emotions but to elicit favorable responses from organics and synthetics alike.
translation: 复杂的社交推测模型不仅可以使机器人模拟有机生物的感情，还可以诱导他们做出对我们有利的回应。
启用§Y智械遗产§!触发效果。

original: The defeat of the Synthetic menace left us with many questions unanswered. But the technology they left behind is driving new discoveries throughout the world.
translation: 被粉碎的智械威胁留下了很多不解之谜，但他们留下的科技正将整个世界推向一个新的高度。

original: Last Stand of the Swiss Guard
The heroic sacrifice of the Swiss Guard will be remembered forever.
translation: 瑞士卫队的英勇牺牲将被永远铭记。
